name: Spooks (itch) (AngryKiwiArts)
description:
Adventure survival. Good luck finding your way after nightfall.
WASD - move
E - shoot Hold to aim
F - flashlight toggle On/Off
left shift(while moving) - dash

You have lost count the number of days since you last a friendly face. You wander the city looking for a safe space or maybe you're out for the hunt. There is no escape, only survival from the spooks.
